info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 3:32PM MST until July 25 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 332 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain had ended over the encompassing Stockton Hill, Pierce Ferry, Antares and Buck and Doe Roads. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain is estimated to have fallen earlier. Flash flooding is ongoing on some sections of those roads. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads, Stockton Hill Road and Buck and Doe Road. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
